Package org.sd.xml

Interface Summary
RecordTree.Data  
SectionModel.PathVisitor  
TagStack Interface for representing and accessing a stack of xml tags.
XmlLite.Data Interface for data in an xml tree node (like text or tag data).
XmlRipper Interface for ripping tags and text from xml.
XmlTextRipperFunction Interface for hooks to be run during xml text ripper iteration.
XtrFunctionCallback Interface for a callback to analyze text generated within an XmlTextRipperFunction.
 

Class Summary
BaseTagStack Abstract base implementation of the tag stack interface.
ContentCollectorCallback An XmlTextRipperFunction callback for adding ripped content to a lucene document.
Encoding An enumeration of types to be used to specify character encodings.
EntityConverter Utility class to convert entity names to characters.
HtmlHelper A utility class to deal with html peculiarities.
HtmlLink  
HtmlTagStack Implementation of the TagStack interface for html.
HtmlTitleRipper Utility for grabbing titles from html.
ImmutableTagStack An implementation of the TagStack interface for immutable stacks.
MetaTagRipper Utility to rip content from html meta tags.
MultiFunctionTextRipper A wrapper around an XmlTextRipper that allows multiple functions to be called during iteration.
MutableTagStack Interface for representing, building, and tearing down a stack of xml tags.
PathHelper Helper class for working with xml paths.
PathKeyBuilder Utility class to build a path key.
RecordTree Tree to organize xml section data.
SectionModel Class for building a section model around an xml (html) document.
Tidy Helper class to clean up html/xml.
XhtmlGrep A utility to run over tidied xhtml files, extracting patterns from the text portions.
Xml2Dot Utility class for converting an xml file to dot format.
Xml2Dot.XmlLabelMaker  
XmlData Container for an xml node and its tag stack.
XmlDataRipper Wrapper around an xml ripper for ripping xml data from xml.
XmlFactory Factory class for building an xml tree.
XmlInputStream An input stream for xml (html) that attempts to find the data's charset and decode accordingly.
XmlIterator An iterator over 2nd level (root's children) xml elements.
XmlLeafNodeRipper Utility class to rip only non-empty leaf text nodes from xml without pre-interpreting the full xml structure.
XmlLite Read in xml as a tree, discarding all comments and normalizing all text.
XmlLite.AbstractData  
XmlLite.Comment  
XmlLite.Script  
XmlLite.Tag  
XmlLite.Text  
XmlNodeIterator An iterator over arbitrary-depth xml elements.
XmlNodeRipper Utility class to rip complete text nodes from xml without pre-interpreting the full xml structure.
XmlPrettyPrint XML Pretty-Printing utility functions
XmlTagParser Thread-safe helper class to parse xml tags.
XmlTagParser.TagResult  
XmlTagRipper Utility class to rip tags from xml without pre-interpreting the full xml structure.
XmlTagStack Implementation of the TagStack interface for generic xml.
XmlTextRipper Utility class to rip text from xml without pre-interpreting the full xml structure.
XmlTreeHelper Utility class for manipulating and interacting with xml trees and data.
XPath Extension of NodePath for XmlLite trees.
XPathApplicator Utility class to cache and apply xpaths.
XtrVisitorFunction An XmlTextRipperFunction that invokes a callback on each ripped text string.
 

Exception Summary
EncodingException A class for identifying encoding exceptions.
